FDG.function_description: Map navigation & travel service interface
data_out: 出行功能界面（地图及相关信息更新）

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the map page (page 0). First, they input a location (中国科学院软件研究所) in the search field (S1), leading to the search results page (page 1). Then, they can either click the back button to return to the map (S2→S3) or clear the input (S2→S4) to re-enter a new location (like 北京大学, S5). Alternatively, they can switch to the travel tab (S6) to access travel-related features, or zoom in on the map (S7). If re-entering a location, the input can be repeated (S8) on the new search page (page 16).

steps.summary: Input '中国科学院软件研究所' in the location search field
Click the back button to return to the map page
Click the location center button on the map page
Click the clear input button to empty the search field
Input '北京大学' in the location search field
Click the '出行 (Travel)' tab to switch to travel services
Click the map zoom-in button on the travel tab page
Repeat input '北京大学' in the location search field (loop)

FDG.function_description: The current page is a map - based travel service interface. It offers functions such as map display, location search, route planning, and various travel - related services (including driving, public transportation, taxi - hailing, hotel booking, etc.). It also provides information like weather, traffic restrictions, and nearby points of interest, aiming to assist users in travel - related decision - making and navigation.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the map - based travel service page. The core action is clicking the map layer button, and after this click, the user remains on the same page, likely to adjust the map layer settings for better travel - related information viewing.

steps.summary: Click the map layer button

FDG.function_description: This page serves as a user - centered interface for map - related contributions and rewards. It enables users to carry out actions like reporting map - related issues (such as location and road problems), participating in merchant - related operations (like store entry), engaging in money - making tasks (such as taking photos and顺路赚钱), and managing/receiving rewards from tasks, so as to jointly build and improve map data while getting incentives.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the main map page (page 0). They click the 'Feedback' button, which navigates to the map - related contribution and reward page (page 5). On this new page, users can perform various actions like reporting map issues, merchant - related operations, and money - making tasks, and also manage or receive rewards from these tasks.

steps.summary: Click the 'Feedback' button on the main map page to enter the map - related contribution and reward page.

FDG.function_description: The current page (Message Center) functions as a hub to display, manage, and view various messages (e.g., from "足迹君", "导航队长", "资讯广播") related to travel, navigation, and informational updates, with options to navigate back or delete messages.
data_out: navigation back to previous map page state

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on the main page (page 0). First, the user clicks the 'Message' button to navigate to the Message Center (page 6). From the Message Center, the user can click the back arrow to return to the main page (page 0). There are no branches or loops as the actions form a simple navigation flow between two pages.

steps.summary: Click 'Message' button to open Message Center
Click back arrow to return to previous page

FDG.function_description: The current page, accessed via the route planning button from the map navigation and travel service interface, functions as a comprehensive walking - focused travel and fitness - related platform. It enables users to plan walking routes (by inputting start and end points), offers additional travel - related services such as public transportation, cycling, and ride - hailing options, and also provides fitness - related features like tracking walking/running activities (including recording mileage, duration, and frequency), managing historical movement records, and accessing special offers for transportation services.
data_out: navigation route (from 我的位置 to 中关村-A1口)

core_logic.logic: The user starts by clicking the route planning button from the map interface (page 0) to enter the walking - focused travel and fitness platform (page 7). Then, they input the destination (e.g., Zhongguancun Subway Station) in the destination input box (page 7). After that, they can either click the search button (page 65) to get the walking route or click the navigation settings button (page 7) for related settings. The main flow is a sequence with a branch point after the destination input to choose between searching for the route or adjusting navigation settings.

steps.summary: Click the route planning button to enter the walking - focused travel and fitness platform
Input the destination (e.g., Zhongguancun Subway Station) in the destination input box
Click the search button to get the walking route
Click the navigation settings button for related navigation settings

FDG.function_description: The current page (reached via the route planning button from the map navigation/travel service interface) enables users to plan walking routes, access features like carbon - neutral planet, track records, real - time public transport, and discounted rides, view and manage walking - related exercise data (such as mileage, duration, and times), start running, set running routes, check historical trajectories and exercise records, and manage historical walking route records (including home and company - related route settings).

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the map navigation page (page 0) and clicks the '路线' (route) button to enter the walking route planning page (page 7). On this page, various walking and exercise - related features are accessible, such as viewing低碳星球 (low - carbon planet), 记录轨迹 (track records), and managing exercise data and historical records.

steps.summary: Click the '路线' (route) button on the map navigation page to enter the walking - related function page.

FDG.function_description: The current page (public transit mode) of the map navigation & travel service app enables users to plan public transit routes, view real - time bus information (including nearby bus routes' arrival times and destinations), access a subway map, and manage travel - related features like historical records and quick access to home/company routes.
data_out: public transit related data (bus schedules, subway map)

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the main map page (page 0) and clicks the public transit mode button to switch to the public transit page (page 8). Then, on the public transit page, the user inputs a destination (e.g., 中关村地铁站) into the destination field. This flow is a straight line with no branches or loops as only two actions are provided.

steps.summary: Click public transit mode button to switch to public transit page
Input destination (中关村地铁站) into destination field

FDG.function_description: This page provides a centralized interface for users to access various transportation and travel - related functions, including managing frequently used functions, viewing recently used functions, and selecting from a wide range of common travel - related options such as different travel modes, hotel booking, and map - related services.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on the main travel - related page (page 0). First, the user clicks the 'More transport options' button (action from [0,8]) to navigate to a new page (page 9). Then, on page 9, the user inputs '打车' in the function search input field (action from [9,0]). There are no branch or loop points as the flow is a simple sequence of two actions.

steps.summary: Click the 'More transport options' button to go to the page with more transport - related functions
Input '打车' in the function search input field

FDG.function_description: This page functions as a location - related input and selection interface, enabling users to input a company's name or address, or to select a location from the map, from saved (collected) locations, or use their current location for subsequent operations such as navigation or location - based services.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 0 and clicks the Home shortcut button to navigate to page 10. On page 10, the user can either input a home address or click the Back button. If the user inputs the address, they proceed with that input; if they click Back, they return to the previous page (page 0).

steps.summary: Click Home shortcut button to go to page 10
Input home address on page 10
Click Back button on page 10

FDG.function_description: This page functions as a location search interface, allowing users to input a company name or address, select a location from the map, access saved locations, or use their current location for navigation or travel - related services.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on page 0. The user clicks the 'Company shortcut button' (action_ref [0,10]), which navigates to page 10. On page 10, the interface allows inputting a company name/address, selecting a map location, accessing saved locations, or using the current location for travel - related services. The core logic is initiated by the click on the company shortcut button to enter the location - related operation interface.

steps.summary: Click the Company shortcut button to navigate to the location - related operation page.

FDG.function_description: The "My" page provides user - centered functionality, including displaying personal information (such as account, level, and travel - related statistics), offering access to features like collection, historical trips, voice packs, and wallet - related services, presenting promotional activities (like card - opening discounts and money - earning tasks), and enabling participation in popular activities, to manage personal - related content and services of the navigation and travel application.
data_in: user profile page entry (我的 tab)

core_logic.logic: The core logic starts with clicking the '我的 (My)' tab on the main page (page 0). This action navigates to the 'My' page (page 13), where personal information, feature access (like collection, historical trips), promotional activities, and popular activities are displayed for managing personal - related content and services of the navigation and travel application.

steps.summary: Click the '我的 (My)' tab to navigate to the 'My' page.

FDG.function_description: This page enables users to add a new location by filling in required information such as the location name, uploading a facade photo, confirming the location on a map, selecting the industry type, and then submitting the form.

core_logic.logic: To add a new location, start by clicking the '新增地点' (Add Location) button. Next, input the location name in the '地点名称' field. Then, click the '上传图片' (Upload Image) button, where you can choose to take a photo, upload from the album, or cancel. If taking a photo, after capturing, you can preview, continue taking photos, or finish to return to the form. Finally, click the '提交' (Submit) button to complete the location addition.

steps.summary: Click '新增地点' button to enter the add location form page.
Input location name '知春里便利店' in the '地点名称' field.
Click '上传图片' button to open the image upload options.
Click '拍照片' option to enter the camera page.
Click the camera shutter button to take a photo.
Click '完成拍照' button to return to the add location form page with the photo uploaded.
Click '提交' button to submit the new location form.

branches.condition: Choose to upload from album (not shown in steps but part of the options)
Choose to cancel (not shown in steps but part of the options)
Continue taking photos (click '继续拍照' button)
Preview the photo (click '照片预览缩略图')
